name: Build a wooden shelter
goal: Safe shelter with foundation, walls, roof, and door

material_requirements.description: Pre-calculated material needs for a 7x7 shelter

steps.title: Check Inventory
steps.details: Use perceive to check current inventory. You need ~200 planks (from ~50 logs) for a 7x7 shelter. If insufficient materials, add gather and craft steps before building.

steps.title: Gather Wood (if needed)
steps.details: Only if inventory check shows insufficient planks: gather logs (any wood type works). params: { "item": "log" }

steps.title: Craft Planks (if needed)
steps.details: Only if you have logs but not enough planks: craft planks. params: { "recipe": "planks", "count": 4 }

steps.title: Move to Build Site
steps.details: Move to the planned build site origin. Choose a flat, clear area. Store this origin coordinate - ALL build steps must use the SAME origin.

steps.title: Build Foundation
steps.details: Place the floor platform. params: { "structure": "platform", "width": 7, "length": 7, "material": "oak_planks", "origin": {x, y, z} }

steps.title: Install Door
steps.details: Place door BEFORE walls to ensure proper 2x1 gap. params: { "structure": "door", "material": "oak_door", "origin": {SAME origin as foundation} }

steps.title: Build Walls
steps.details: Build perimeter walls around the foundation. params: { "structure": "walls", "width": 7, "length": 7, "height": 4, "material": "oak_planks", "door": true, "origin": {SAME origin as foundation} }

steps.title: Build Roof
steps.details: Build roof on top of walls. The roof origin Y should be foundation_y + 4 (wall height). params: { "structure": "roof", "width": 7, "length": 7, "material": "oak_planks", "origin": {x: same, y: foundation_y + 4, z: same} }

important_notes: ALL build steps must use the SAME X and Z origin coordinates
Roof Y-coordinate = Foundation Y + 4 (on top of 4-high walls)
Any wood type works (oak, spruce, birch, etc.) - use what's available
Door must be placed BEFORE walls to ensure proper gap
The bot will automatically handle material variants (oak_planks, spruce_planks, etc.)
